body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Attack with Mikaeus
2. Tap to add +1/+1
3. Still do damage to creature What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Maybe rules have changed or I recall incorrectly, but I thought that when a creature was doing damage, if it had to tap to activate any ability, it no longer dealt damage. 
Perhaps I either recall incorrectly or this is a difference in rules specific to Magarena What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.26
Windows 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
